absorb.Effect: Restores the user's HP by 1/2 of the damage inflicted on the target.
absorb.name: Absorb

acid.Effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
acid.name: Acid

acidarmor.Effect: Raises the user's Defense by 2 stages.
acidarmor.name: Acid Armor

aerialace.Effect: Ignores Evasion and Accuracyuracy modifiers and never misses except against Protect Detect or a target in the middle of Dig Fly Dive or Bounce.
aerialace.name: Aerial Ace

aeroblast.Effect: Has a high critical hit ratio.
aeroblast.name: Aeroblast

agility.Effect: Raises the user's Speed by 2 stages.
agility.name: Agility

aircutter.Effect: Has a high critical hit ratio.
aircutter.name: Air Cutter

amnesia.Effect: Raises the user's Special Defense by 2 stages.
amnesia.name: Amnesia

ancientpower.Effect: Has a 10% chance to raise all of the user's stats by 1 stage.
ancientpower.name: Ancientpower

armthrust.Effect: Attacks 2-5 times in one turn. if one of these attacks breaks a target's Substitute the target will take damage for the rest of the hits. This move has a 3/8 chance to hit twice a 3/8 chance to hit three times a 1/8 chance to hit four times and a 1/8 chance to hit five times.
armthrust.name: Arm Thrust

aromatherapy.Effect: Every Pokemon in the user's party is cured of status conditions.
aromatherapy.name: Aromatherapy

assist.Effect: The user performs a random move from any of the Pokemon on its team. Assist cannot generate itself Counter Covet Destiny Bond Detect Endure Focus Punch Follow Me Helping Hand Metronome Mimic Mirror Coat Mirror Move Protect Sketch Sleep Talk Snatch Struggle Thief or Trick.
assist.name: Assist

astonish.Effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
astonish.name: Astonish

attract.Effect: Infatuates Pokemon of the opposite gender even if they have a Substitute causing a 50% chance for the target's attack to fail.
attract.name: Attract

aurorabeam.Effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1 stage.
aurorabeam.name: Aurora Beam

barrage.Effect: Attacks 2-5 times in one turn. if one of these attacks breaks a target's Substitute the target will take damage for the rest of the hits. This move has a 3/8 chance to hit twice a 3/8 chance to hit three times a 1/8 chance to hit four times and a 1/8 chance to hit five times.
barrage.name: Barrage

barrier.Effect: Raises the user's Defense by 2 stages.
barrier.name: Barrier

batonpass.Effect: The user returns to its party bypassing any trapping moves and Pursuit. it passes all stat modifiers (positive or negative) as well as confusion Focus Energy Ingrain Stockpiles Perish Song count Leech Seed Ghost Curses Mind Reader Lock-On Block Mean Look Spider Web and Substitute to the replacement Pokemon.
batonpass.name: Baton Pass

beatup.Effect: Each healthy (i.e. not fainted nor inflicted with a status condition) Pokemon in your party contributes a typeless 10 base power hit determined solely by their base Attack and Defense stats.
beatup.name: Beat Up

bellydrum.Effect: The user maximizes its Attack but sacrifices 50% of its max HP.
bellydrum.name: Belly Drum

bide.Effect: The user absorbs all damage for 2-3 turns and then inflicts twice the absorbed damage on its target. This move ignores the target's type but still cannot hit Ghost-type Pokemon.
bide.name: Bide

bind.Effect: Traps the target for 2-5 turns causing damage equal to 1/16 of its max HP each turn. this trapped effect can be broken by Rapid Spin. The target can still switch out if it uses Baton Pass.
bind.name: Bind

bite.Effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
bite.name: Bite

blastburn.Effect: The user recharges during its next turn. as a result until the end of the next turn the user becomes uncontrollable.
blastburn.name: Blast Burn

blazekick.Effect: Has a high critical hit ratio and a 10% chance to burn the target.
blazekick.name: Blaze Kick

blizzard.Effect: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.
blizzard.name: Blizzard

block.Effect: As long as the user remains in battle the target cannot switch out unless it uses Baton Pass. The target will still be trapped if the user switches out by using Baton Pass.
block.name: Block

bodyslam.Effect: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
bodyslam.name: Body Slam

boneclub.Effect: Has a 10% chance to make the target flinch.
boneclub.name: Bone Club

bonerush.Effect: Attacks 2-5 times in one turn. if one of these attacks breaks a target's Substitute the target will take damage for the rest of the hits. This move has a 3/8 chance to hit twice a 3/8 chance to hit three times a 1/8 chance to hit four times and a 1/8 chance to hit five times.
bonerush.name: Bone Rush

bonemerang.Effect: Strikes twice. if the first hit breaks the target's Substitute the real Pokemon will take damage from the second hit.
bonemerang.name: Bonemerang

bounce.Effect: On the first turn the user bounces into the air becoming uncontrollable and evades most attacks. Gust Twister Thunder and Sky Uppercut have normal Accuracyuracy against a mid-air Pokemon with Gust and Twister also gaining doubled power. The user may also be hit in mid-air if it was previously targeted by Lock-On or Mind Reader. On the second turn the user descends and has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
bounce.name: Bounce

brickbreak.Effect: Reflect and Light Screen are removed from the target's field even if the attack misses. However if the target is a Ghost-type this will not occur.
brickbreak.name: Brick Break

bubble.Effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
bubble.name: Bubble

bubblebeam.Effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
bubblebeam.name: Bubblebeam

bulkup.Effect: Raises the user's Attack and Defense by 1 stage each.
bulkup.name: Bulk Up

bulletseed.Effect: Attacks 2-5 times in one turn. if one of these attacks breaks a target's Substitute the target will take damage for the rest of the hits. This move has a 3/8 chance to hit twice a 3/8 chance to hit three times a 1/8 chance to hit four times and a 1/8 chance to hit five times.
bulletseed.name: Bullet Seed

calmmind.Effect: Raises the user's Special Attack and Special Defense by 1 stage each.
calmmind.name: Calm Mind

camouflage.Effect: The user's type changes Accuracyording to the current terrain. It becomes Grass-type in tall grass and very tall grass (as well as in puddles and very shallow water) Water-type while surfing on or diving under any body of water Rock-type while inside any caves (including Shoal Cave) or on any rocky terrain Ground-type on beach and desert sands and Normal-type everywhere else. The user will always become Normal-type during link battles.
camouflage.name: Camouflage

charge.Effect: Doubles the power of the user's Electric attacks on the next turn.
charge.name: Charge

charm.Effect: Lowers the target's Attack by 2 stages.
charm.name: Charm

clamp.Effect: Traps the target for 2-5 turns causing damage equal to 1/16 of its max HP each turn. this trapped effect can be broken by Rapid Spin. The target can still switch out if it uses Baton Pass.
clamp.name: Clamp

cometpunch.Effect: Attacks 2-5 times in one turn. if one of these attacks breaks a target's Substitute the target will take damage for the rest of the hits. This move has a 3/8 chance to hit twice a 3/8 chance to hit three times a 1/8 chance to hit four times and a 1/8 chance to hit five times.
cometpunch.name: Comet Punch

confusion.Effect: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.
confusion.name: Confusion

constrict.Effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
constrict.name: Constrict

conversion.Effect: The user's type changes to match the type of one of its four attacks. This move fails if the user cannot change its type under this condition.
conversion.name: Conversion

conversion2.Effect: The user's type changes to one that resists the type of the last attack that hit the user. In double battles this situation holds even when the user is last hit by an attack from its partner.
conversion2.name: Conversion 2

cosmicpower.Effect: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage each.
cosmicpower.name: Cosmic Power

cottonspore.Effect: Lowers the target's Speed by 2 stages.
cottonspore.name: Cotton Spore

counter.Effect: Almost always goes last. if an opponent strikes with a Physical attack before the user's turn the user retaliates for twice the damage it had endured. In double battles this attack targets the last opponent to hit the user with a Physical attack and cannot hit the user's teammate.
counter.name: Counter

covet.Effect: Steals the target's held item unless the user is already holding an item or the target has Sticky Hold. Recycle cannot recover the stolen item.
covet.name: Covet

crabhammer.Effect: Has a high critical hit ratio.
crabhammer.name: Crabhammer

crosschop.Effect: Has a high critical hit ratio.
crosschop.name: Cross Chop

crunch.Effect: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
crunch.name: Crunch

crushclaw.Effect: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
crushclaw.name: Crush Claw

curse.Effect: When used by a Ghost-type the user sacrifices half of its max HP to sap the target by 1/4 of its max HP per turn. When used by anything else the user's Speed is decreased by 1 stage and its Attack and Defense are increased by 1 stage.
curse.name: Curse

defensecurl.Effect: Raises the user's Defense by 1 stage. after one use of this move the user's starting base power is doubled for every use of Rollout or Ice Ball.
defensecurl.name: Defense Curl

destinybond.Effect: Causes an opponent to faint if its next attack KOs the user.
destinybond.name: Destiny Bond

detect.Effect: Almost always goes first. The user is protected from all attacks for one turn but the move's success rate halves with each consecutive use of Protect Detect or Endure.
detect.name: Detect

dig.Effect: On the first turn the user digs underground becoming uncontrollable and evades all attacks. Earthquake and Magnitude can hit underground and gain doubled power. The user may also be hit underground if it was previously targeted by Lock-On or Mind Reader or if it is attacked by a Pokemon with No Guard. On the second turn the user attacks.
dig.name: Dig

disable.Effect: The target cannot choose its last move for 4-7 turns. Disable only works on one move at a time and fails if the target has not yet used a move or if its move has run out of PP. The target does nothing if it is about to use a move that becomes disabled.
disable.name: Disable

dive.Effect: On the first turn the user dives underwater becoming uncontrollable and evades all attacks except for Surf and Whirlpool which have doubled power. the user may also be hit underwater if it was previously targeted by Lock-On or Mind Reader. On the second turn the user attacks.
dive.name: Dive

dizzypunch.Effect: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.
dizzypunch.name: Dizzy Punch

doomdesire.Effect: This move even if the user and/or the target switch out will strike the active target at the end of the second turn after its use. This move cannot cause a critical hit and its damage is calculated by using the original user's Special Attack and the original target's Special Defense. The move's damage is typeless so it never receives STAB and ignores weaknesses resistances and immunities against this move's type. Only one instance of Doom Desire or Future Sight may be active at a time. because Doom Desire is typeless and occurs at the end of the round it also hits through Protect Detect Endure and Wonder Guard.
doomdesire.name: Doom Desire

doublekick.Effect: Strikes twice. if the first hit breaks the target's Substitute the real Pokemon will take damage from the second hit.
doublekick.name: Double Kick

doubleteam.Effect: Raises the user's Evasion by 1 stage.
doubleteam.name: Double Team

doubleslap.Effect: Attacks 2-5 times in one turn. if one of these attacks breaks a target's Substitute the target will take damage for the rest of the hits. This move has a 3/8 chance to hit twice a 3/8 chance to hit three times a 1/8 chance to hit four times and a 1/8 chance to hit five times.
doubleslap.name: Doubleslap

dragondance.Effect: Raises the user's Attack and Speed by 1 stage each.
dragondance.name: Dragon Dance

dragonbreath.Effect: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
dragonbreath.name: Dragonbreath

dreameater.Effect: Restores the user's HP by 1/2 of the damage inflicted on the target but only works on a sleeping target.
dreameater.name: Dream Eater

earthquake.Effect: Power doubles when performed against Pokemon using Dig.
earthquake.name: Earthquake

ember.Effect: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
ember.name: Ember

encore.Effect: The target is forced to use its last attack for the next 2-6 turns. The effects of this move will end immediately if the target runs out of PP for the repeated attack. In double battles a Pokemon who has received an Encore will target a random opponent with single-target attacks.
encore.name: Encore

endeavor.Effect: Inflicts damage equal to the target's current HP - the user's current HP.
endeavor.name: Endeavor

endure.Effect: Almost always goes first. The user is left with at least 1 HP following any attacks for one turn but the move's success rate halves with each consecutive use of Protect Detect or Endure.
endure.name: Endure

eruption.Effect: Base power decreases as the user's HP decreases.
eruption.name: Eruption

explosion.Effect: The Defense stat of other Pokemon is halved against this attack essentially doubling the move's base power. causes the user to faint.
explosion.name: Explosion

extrasensory.Effect: Has a 10% chance to make the target flinch.
extrasensory.name: Extrasensory

facade.Effect: Power doubles if the user is inflicted with burn paralysis or poison.
facade.name: Facade

faintattack.Effect: Ignores Evasion and Accuracyuracy modifiers and never misses except against Protect Detect or a target in the middle of Dig Fly Dive or Bounce.
faintattack.name: Faint Attack

fakeout.Effect: If this is the user's first move after being sent or switched into battle the target flinches. this move fails otherwise and against targets with Inner Focus.
fakeout.name: Fake Out

faketears.Effect: Lowers the target's Special Defense by 2 stages.
faketears.name: Fake Tears

falseswipe.Effect: Leaves the target with at least 1 HP.
falseswipe.name: False Swipe

featherdance.Effect: Lowers the target's Attack by 2 stages.
featherdance.name: Featherdance

fireblast.Effect: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
fireblast.name: Fire Blast

firepunch.Effect: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
firepunch.name: Fire Punch

firespin.Effect: Traps the target for 2-5 turns causing damage equal to 1/16 of its max HP each turn. this trapped effect can be broken by Rapid Spin. The target can still switch out if it uses Baton Pass.
firespin.name: Fire Spin

fissure.Effect: The target faints. doesn't work on higher-leveled Pokemon.
fissure.name: Fissure

flail.Effect: Base power increases as the user's HP decreases.
flail.name: Flail

flamewheel.Effect: Has a 10% chance to burn the target. can be used while frozen which both attacks the target normally and thaws the user.
flamewheel.name: Flame Wheel

flamethrower.Effect: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
flamethrower.name: Flamethrower

flash.Effect: Lowers the target's Accuracyuracy by 1 stage.
flash.name: Flash

flatter.Effect: Confuses the target and raises its Special Attack by 1 stage.
flatter.name: Flatter

fly.Effect: On the first turn the user flies into the air becoming uncontrollable and evades most attacks. Gust Twister Thunder and Sky Uppercut have normal Accuracyuracy against a mid-air Pokemon with Gust and Twister also gaining doubled power. The user may also be hit in mid-air if it was previously targeted by Lock-On or Mind Reader. On the second turn the user attacks.
fly.name: Fly

focusenergy.Effect: Raises the user's chance for a critical hit by one domain.
focusenergy.name: Focus Energy

focuspunch.Effect: At the beginning of the round the user tightens its focus. the attack itself usually goes last and will fail if the user is attacked by any other Pokemon during the turn.
focuspunch.name: Focus Punch

followme.Effect: Almost always goes first. For the rest of the turn all attacks from the opponent's team that target the user's team are redirected toward the user. In double battles the user's teammate will not be protected from attacks that have more than one intended target.
followme.name: Follow Me

foresight.Effect: Until the target faints or switches the user's Accuracyuracy modifiers and the target's Evasion modifiers are ignored. Ghost-type targets also lose their immunities against Normal-type and Fighting-type moves.
foresight.name: Foresight

frenzyplant.Effect: The user recharges during its next turn. as a result until the end of the next turn the user becomes uncontrollable.
frenzyplant.name: Frenzy Plant

frustration.Effect: Power increases as user's happiness decreases. maximum 102 BP.
frustration.name: Frustration

furyattack.Effect: Attacks 2-5 times in one turn. if one of these attacks breaks a target's Substitute the target will take damage for the rest of the hits. This move has a 3/8 chance to hit twice a 3/8 chance to hit three times a 1/8 chance to hit four times and a 1/8 chance to hit five times.
furyattack.name: Fury Attack

furycutter.Effect: The base power of this move doubles with each consecutive hit. however power is capped at a maximum 160 BP and remains there for any subsequent uses. If this move misses or if the user selects another move base power will be reset to 10 BP on the next turn.
furycutter.name: Fury Cutter

furyswipes.Effect: Attacks 2-5 times in one turn. if one of these attacks breaks a target's Substitute the target will take damage for the rest of the hits. This move has a 3/8 chance to hit twice a 3/8 chance to hit three times a 1/8 chance to hit four times and a 1/8 chance to hit five times.
furyswipes.name: Fury Swipes

futuresight.Effect: This move even if the user and/or the target switch out will strike the active target at the end of the second turn after its use. This move cannot cause a critical hit and its damage is calculated by using the original user's Special Attack and the original target's Special Defense. The move's damage is typeless so it never receives STAB and ignores weaknesses resistances and immunities against this move's type. Only one instance of Future Sight or Doom Desire may be active at a time. because Future Sight is typeless and occurs at the end of the round it also hits through Protect Detect Endure and Wonder Guard.
futuresight.name: Future Sight

gigadrain.Effect: Restores the user's HP by 1/2 of the damage inflicted on the target.
gigadrain.name: Giga Drain

growl.Effect: Lowers the target's Attack by 1 stage.
growl.name: Growl

growth.Effect: Raises the user's Special Attack by 1 stage.
growth.name: Growth

grudge.Effect: The target's next move is set to 0 PP if it directly KOs the user.
grudge.name: Grudge

guillotine.Effect: The target faints. doesn't work on higher-leveled Pokemon.
guillotine.name: Guillotine

gust.Effect: Power doubles if the target is in mid-air via Fly or Bounce.
gust.name: Gust

hail.Effect: Cancels all other weather moves. For 5 turns: each active Pokemon even when protected by a Substitute loses 1/16 of its max HP unless it is an Ice-type the power of Solarbeam is halved and the healing power of Morning Sun Synthesis and Moonlight is halved.
hail.name: Hail

harden.Effect: Raises the user's Defense by 1 stage.
harden.name: Harden

haze.Effect: Eliminates any stat modifiers from all active Pokemon. The stat boost from Choice Band is not affected.
haze.name: Haze

headbutt.Effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
headbutt.name: Headbutt

healbell.Effect: Every Pokemon in the user's party is cured of status conditions. Allied Pokemon who have Soundproof are not affected.
healbell.name: Heal Bell

heatwave.Effect: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
heatwave.name: Heat Wave

helpinghand.Effect: Always goes first. In double battles the power of the user's partner's attacks is increased by 1.5x for that turn. does nothing in single battles.
helpinghand.name: Helping Hand

hijumpkick.Effect: If this attack misses the target the user receives 1/8 "recoil" damage of what it would have inflicted.
hijumpkick.name: Hi Jump Kick

horndrill.Effect: The target faints. doesn't work on higher-leveled Pokemon.
horndrill.name: Horn Drill

howl.Effect: Raises the user's Attack by 1 stage.
howl.name: Howl

hydrocannon.Effect: The user recharges during its next turn. as a result until the end of the next turn the user becomes uncontrollable.
hydrocannon.name: Hydro Cannon

hyperbeam.Effect: The user recharges during its next turn. as a result until the end of the next turn the user becomes uncontrollable.
hyperbeam.name: Hyper Beam

hyperfang.Effect: Has a 10% chance to make the target flinch.
hyperfang.name: Hyper Fang

iceball.Effect: The user attacks uncontrollably for five turns. this move's power doubles after each turn and also if Defense Curl was used beforehand. Its power resets after five turns have ended or if the attack misses.
iceball.name: Ice Ball

icebeam.Effect: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.
icebeam.name: Ice Beam

icepunch.Effect: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.
icepunch.name: Ice Punch

iciclespear.Effect: Attacks 2-5 times in one turn. if one of these attacks breaks a target's Substitute the target will take damage for the rest of the hits. This move has a 3/8 chance to hit twice a 3/8 chance to hit three times a 1/8 chance to hit four times and a 1/8 chance to hit five times.
iciclespear.name: Icicle Spear

icywind.Effect: Lowers the target's Speed by 1 stage.
icywind.name: Icy Wind

imprison.Effect: Until the user faints or switches out the opponent cannot select any moves that it has in common with the user. In double battles this move affects both opponents.
imprison.name: Imprison

ingrain.Effect: The user recovers 1/16 of its max HP after each turn but it cannot be switched out or forced to switch out.
ingrain.name: Ingrain

irondefense.Effect: Raises the user's Defense by 2 stages.
irondefense.name: Iron Defense

irontail.Effect: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
irontail.name: Iron Tail

jumpkick.Effect: If this attack misses the target the user receives 1/8 "recoil" damage of what it would have inflicted.
jumpkick.name: Jump Kick

karatechop.Effect: Has a high critical hit ratio.
karatechop.name: Karate Chop

kinesis.Effect: Lowers the target's Accuracyuracy by 1 stage.
kinesis.name: Kinesis

knockoff.Effect: Disables the target's held item unless it has Sticky Hold. Items lost to this move cannot be recovered by using Recycle.
knockoff.name: Knock Off

leafblade.Effect: Has a high critical hit ratio.
leafblade.name: Leaf Blade

leechlife.Effect: Restores the user's HP by 1/2 of the damage inflicted on the target.
leechlife.name: Leech Life

leechseed.Effect: The user steals 1/8 of the target's max HP until the target is switched out is KO'ed or uses Rapid Spin. does not work against Grass-type Pokemon or Pokemon behind Substitutes.
leechseed.name: Leech Seed

leer.Effect: Lowers the target's Defense by 1 stage.
leer.name: Leer

lick.Effect: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
lick.name: Lick

lightscreen.Effect: All Pokemon in the user's party receive 1/2 damage from Special attacks for 5 turns. Light Screen will be removed from the user's field if an opponent's Pokemon uses Brick Break. In double battles both Pokemon are shielded but damage protection is reduced from 1/2 to 1/3.
lightscreen.name: Light Screen

lock-on.Effect: This move ensures that the user's next attack will hit against its current target. This effect can be Baton Passed to another Pokemon. Lock-On fails against Pokemon in the middle of using Protect Detect Dig Fly Bounce or Dive as well as Pokemon behind a Substitute.
lock-on.name: Lock-On

lowkick.Effect: Base power increases as the target's weight increases.
lowkick.name: Low Kick

lusterpurge.Effect: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
lusterpurge.name: Luster Purge

magiccoat.Effect: Almost always goes first. Until the end of the turn the user will reflect one non-damaging move back at its user (including allies). In Double Battles this move will only reflect the first applicable move before wearing off.
magiccoat.name: Magic Coat

magicalleaf.Effect: Ignores Evasion and Accuracyuracy modifiers and never misses except against Protect Detect or a target in the middle of Dig Fly Dive or Bounce.
magicalleaf.name: Magical Leaf

magnitude.Effect: Deals variable damage between 10 base power and 130 base power as well as double damage against Digging Pokemon.
magnitude.name: Magnitude

meanlook.Effect: As long as the user remains in battle the target cannot switch out unless it uses Baton Pass. The target will still be trapped if the user switches out by using Baton Pass.
meanlook.name: Mean Look

meditate.Effect: Raises the user's Attack by 1 stage.
meditate.name: Meditate

megadrain.Effect: Restores the user's HP by 1/2 of the damage inflicted on the target.
megadrain.name: Mega Drain

memento.Effect: The user sacrifices itself to lower the target's Attack and Special Attack by 2 stages each.
memento.name: Memento

metalclaw.Effect: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1 stage.
metalclaw.name: Metal Claw

metalsound.Effect: Lowers the target's Special Defense by 2 stages.
metalsound.name: Metal Sound

meteormash.Effect: Has a 20% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1 stage.
meteormash.name: Meteor Mash

metronome.Effect: The user performs a randomly selected move. almost any move in the game could be picked. Metronome cannot generate itself Assist Counter Covet Destiny Bond Detect Endure Focus Punch Follow Me Helping Hand Mimic Mirror Coat Mirror Move Protect Sketch Sleep Talk Snatch Struggle Thief Trick or any move that the user already knows.
metronome.name: Metronome

milkdrink.Effect: Restores 1/2 of the user's max HP.
milkdrink.name: Milk Drink

mimic.Effect: This move is temporarily replaced by the target's last move. the replacement move will have 5 PP and become part of the user's moveset until the user switches out or the battle ends. Mimic copies attacks even if they miss or the user has immunity toward their type. it cannot copy itself Struggle Transform Sketch Metronome or moves that the user already knows and it will fail if the target has yet to use a move.
mimic.name: Mimic

mindreader.Effect: This move ensures that the user's next attack will hit against its current target. This effect can be Baton Passed to another Pokemon. Mind Reader fails against Pokemon in the middle of using Protect Detect Dig Fly Bounce or Dive as well as Pokemon behind a Substitute.
mindreader.name: Mind Reader

minimize.Effect: Raises the user's Evasion by 1 stage. however Stomp retains its normal Accuracyuracy and gains doubled power against Minimized Pokemon.
minimize.name: Minimize

mirrorcoat.Effect: Almost always goes last. if an opponent strikes with a Special attack before the user's turn the user retaliates for twice the damage it had endured. In double battles this attack targets the last opponent to hit the user with a Special attack and cannot hit the user's teammate.
mirrorcoat.name: Mirror Coat

mirrormove.Effect: The user performs the last move executed by its target. if applicable an attack's damage is calculated with the user's stats level and type(s). This moves fails if the target has not yet used a move. Mirror Move cannot copy Encore Struggle global moves affecting all Pokemon on the field (such as Hail Rain Dance Sandstorm and Sunny Day) moves that can bypass Protect (Doom Desire Future Sight Imprison Perish Song Psych Up Role Play and Transform) and moves that do not have a specific target (such as Light Screen Reflect Safeguard and Spikes).
mirrormove.name: Mirror Move

mist.Effect: Protects every Pokemon on the user's team from negative stat modifiers caused by other Pokemon (including teammates) but not by itself for five turns. The team's Accuracyuracy and Evasion stats are also protected. Moves that cause negative stat modifiers as a secondary effect such as Psychic still deal their regular damage.
mist.name: Mist

mistball.Effect: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.
mistball.name: Mist Ball

moonlight.Effect: Restores a fraction of the user's max HP depending on the weather: 2/3 during Sunny Day 1/2 during regular weather and 1/4 during Rain Dance Hail and Sandstorm.
moonlight.name: Moonlight

morningsun.Effect: Restores a fraction of the user's max HP depending on the weather: 2/3 during Sunny Day 1/2 during regular weather and 1/4 during Rain Dance Hail and Sandstorm.
morningsun.name: Morning Sun

mudshot.Effect: Lowers the target's Speed by 1 stage.
mudshot.name: Mud Shot

mudsport.Effect: All Electric-type moves are 50% weaker until the user switches out.
mudsport.name: Mud Sport

mud-slap.Effect: Lowers the target's Accuracyuracy by 1 stage.
mud-slap.name: Mud-Slap

muddywater.Effect: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's Accuracyuracy by 1 stage.
muddywater.name: Muddy Water

naturepower.Effect: The user generates another move depending on the battle's current terrain. It generates Stun Spore in grass and tall grass (as well as in puddles and very shallow water) Razor Leaf in very tall grass Surf while surfing on top of river and ocean water Bubblebeam while surfing on top of pond water Hydro Pump while diving underwater Rock Slide on any rocky outdoor terrain Shadow Ball inside of caves Earthquake on beach and desert sand and Swift everywhere else (including link battles).
naturepower.name: Nature Power

needlearm.Effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
needlearm.name: Needle Arm

nightshade.Effect: Does damage equal to user's level.
nightshade.name: Night Shade

nightmare.Effect: This move only works on a sleeping target. as long as the target remains asleep and in battle 1/4 of its max HP is sapped after each turn.
nightmare.name: Nightmare

octazooka.Effect: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Accuracyuracy by 1 stage.
octazooka.name: Octazooka

odorsleuth.Effect: Until the target faints or switches the user's Accuracyuracy modifiers and the target's Evasion modifiers are ignored. Ghost-type targets also lose their immunities against Normal-type and Fighting-type moves.
odorsleuth.name: Odor Sleuth

outrage.Effect: The user attacks uncontrollably for 2-3 turns and then gets confused.
outrage.name: Outrage

overheat.Effect: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages after use.
overheat.name: Overheat

painsplit.Effect: Calculates the average of the user's current HP and the target's HP. the HP of both Pokemon is set to this average.
painsplit.name: Pain Split

payday.Effect: The player picks up extra money after in-game battles. the money received is equal to: [user's level * 5 * number of times Pay Day is used]. The player does not lose money if the opponent uses Pay Day but the player wins the battle.
payday.name: Pay Day

perishsong.Effect: All active Pokemon will faint in 3 turns unless they are switched out.
perishsong.name: Perish Song

petaldance.Effect: The user attacks uncontrollably for 2-3 turns and then gets confused.
petaldance.name: Petal Dance

pinmissile.Effect: Attacks 2-5 times in one turn. if one of these attacks breaks a target's Substitute the target will take damage for the rest of the hits. This move has a 3/8 chance to hit twice a 3/8 chance to hit three times a 1/8 chance to hit four times and a 1/8 chance to hit five times.
pinmissile.name: Pin Missile

poisonfang.Effect: Has a 30% chance to inflict Toxic poison on the target.
poisonfang.name: Poison Fang

poisonsting.Effect: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.
poisonsting.name: Poison Sting

poisontail.Effect: Has a high critical hit ratio and a 10% chance to poison the target.
poisontail.name: Poison Tail

powdersnow.Effect: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.
powdersnow.name: Powder Snow

present.Effect: Randomly either attacks with a variable power between 40 base power and 120 base power or heals the target by 80 HP.
present.name: Present

protect.Effect: Almost always goes first. The user is protected from all attacks for one turn but the move's success rate halves with each consecutive use of Protect Detect or Endure.
protect.name: Protect

psybeam.Effect: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.
psybeam.name: Psybeam

psychup.Effect: The user copies all seven of the target's current stat modifiers.
psychup.name: Psych Up

psychic.Effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
psychic.name: Psychic

psychoboost.Effect: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages after use.
psychoboost.name: Psycho Boost

psywave.Effect: Randomly inflicts set damage equal to .5x .6x .7x .8x .9x 1.0x 1.1x 1.2x 1.3x 1.4x or 1.5x the user's level.
psywave.name: Psywave

pursuit.Effect: If the target switches out on the current turn this move strikes with doubled power before the switch. Baton Passers still escape safely.
pursuit.name: Pursuit

rage.Effect: The user's Attack rises by 1 stage if attacked before its next move.
rage.name: Rage

raindance.Effect: Cancels all other weather moves. For 5 turns: the power of Water attacks is increased by 50% the power of Fire attacks is decreased by 50% Thunder becomes 100% Accuracyurate the power of Solarbeam is halved and the healing power of Morning Sun Synthesis and Moonlight is decreased from 1/2 to 1/4 of the user's max HP.
raindance.name: Rain Dance

rapidspin.Effect: Removes Spikes and Leech Seed from the user's side of the field. also frees the user from Bind Clamp Fire Spin Sand Tomb Whirlpool and Wrap. These effects do not occur if the move misses or is used against Ghost-type Pokemon.
rapidspin.name: Rapid Spin

razorleaf.Effect: Has a high critical hit ratio.
razorleaf.name: Razor Leaf

razorwind.Effect: The user prepares on turn one becoming uncontrollable and then attacks on turn two. Has a high critical hit ratio.
razorwind.name: Razor Wind

recover.Effect: Restores 1/2 of the user's max HP.
recover.name: Recover

recycle.Effect: The user's lost item is recovered. Items lost to Trick Thief Covet or Knock Off cannot be recovered.
recycle.name: Recycle

reflect.Effect: All Pokemon in the user's party receive 1/2 damage from Physical attacks for 5 turns. Reflect will be removed from the user's field if an opponent's Pokemon uses Brick Break. In double battles both Pokemon are shielded but damage protection is reduced from 1/2 to 1/3.
reflect.name: Reflect

refresh.Effect: The user recovers from burn poison and paralysis.
refresh.name: Refresh

rest.Effect: The user is cured of status effects (and confusion) and recovers full HP but falls asleep for 2 turns. Pokemon who have Early Bird will wake up one turn early.
rest.name: Rest

return.Effect: Power increases as user's happiness increases. maximum 102 BP.
return.name: Return

revenge.Effect: Almost always goes last even after another Pokemon's Focus Punch. this move's base power doubles if the user is damaged before its turn.
revenge.name: Revenge

reversal.Effect: Base power increases as the user's HP decreases.
reversal.name: Reversal

roar.Effect: Almost always goes last. in trainer battles the target is switched out for a random member of its team. Escapes from wild battles. Has no effect if the target has Suction Cups Soundproof or used Ingrain.
roar.name: Roar

rockblast.Effect: Attacks 2-5 times in one turn. if one of these attacks breaks a target's Substitute the target will take damage for the rest of the hits. This move has a 3/8 chance to hit twice a 3/8 chance to hit three times a 1/8 chance to hit four times and a 1/8 chance to hit five times.
rockblast.name: Rock Blast

rockslide.Effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
rockslide.name: Rock Slide

rocksmash.Effect: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
rocksmash.name: Rock Smash

rocktomb.Effect: Lowers the target's Speed by 1 stage.
rocktomb.name: Rock Tomb

roleplay.Effect: The user's own ability is overwritten with the target's ability. does nothing if the target's ability is Wonder Guard.
roleplay.name: Role Play

rollingkick.Effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
rollingkick.name: Rolling Kick

rollout.Effect: The user attacks uncontrollably for five turns. this move's power doubles after each turn and also if Defense Curl was used beforehand. Its power resets after five turns have ended or if the attack misses.
rollout.name: Rollout

sacredfire.Effect: Has a 50% chance to burn the target. can be used while frozen which both attacks the target normally and thaws the user.
sacredfire.name: Sacred Fire

safeguard.Effect: Protects the user's entire team from status conditions for five turns.
safeguard.name: Safeguard

sandtomb.Effect: Traps the target for 2-5 turns causing damage equal to 1/16 of its max HP each turn. this trapped effect can be broken by Rapid Spin. The target can still switch out if it uses Baton Pass.
sandtomb.name: Sand Tomb

sand-attack.Effect: Lowers the target's Accuracyuracy by 1 stage.
sand-attack.name: Sand-Attack

sandstorm.Effect: Cancels all other weather moves. For 5 turns: each active Pokemon even when protected by a Substitute loses 1/16 of its max HP unless it is a Ground- Rock- or Steel-type the power of Solarbeam is halved and the healing power of Morning Sun Synthesis and Moonlight is halved.
sandstorm.name: Sandstorm

scaryface.Effect: Lowers the target's Speed by 2 stages.
scaryface.name: Scary Face

screech.Effect: Lowers the target's Defense by 2 stages.
screech.name: Screech

secretpower.Effect: This move has a 30% chance to inflict a side effect depending on the battle's current terrain. The target may be put to sleep in any type of grass (or in puddles and very shallow water) its Attack may be lowered by 1 stage while surfing on river or ocean water its Defense may be lowered by 1 stage while diving underwater its Speed may be lowered by 1 stage while surfing on pond water its Accuracyuracy may be lowered by 1 stage on beach and desert sand it may flinch in caves it may become confused on rocky outdoor terrain it may be poisoned on ashy terrain and it may become paralyzed everywhere else (including link battles).
secretpower.name: Secret Power

seismictoss.Effect: Does damage equal to user's level.
seismictoss.name: Seismic Toss

self-destruct.Effect: The Defense stat of other Pokemon is halved against this attack essentially doubling the move's base power. causes the user to faint.
self-destruct.name: Self-Destruct

shadowball.Effect: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
shadowball.name: Shadow Ball

shadowpunch.Effect: Ignores Evasion and Accuracyuracy modifiers and never misses except against Protect Detect or a target in the middle of Dig Fly Dive or Bounce.
shadowpunch.name: Shadow Punch

sharpen.Effect: Raises the user's Attack by 1 stage.
sharpen.name: Sharpen

sheercold.Effect: The target faints. doesn't work on higher-leveled Pokemon.
sheercold.name: Sheer Cold

shockwave.Effect: Ignores Evasion and Accuracyuracy modifiers and never misses except against Protect Detect or a target in the middle of Dig Fly Dive or Bounce.
shockwave.name: Shock Wave

signalbeam.Effect: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.
signalbeam.name: Signal Beam

silverwind.Effect: Has a 10% chance to raise all of the user's stats by 1 stage.
silverwind.name: Silver Wind

sketch.Effect: The user permanently replaces Sketch with the last move used by the target. Sketch cannot copy itself Memento or Struggle. Transform and moves that generate other moves can be Sketched successfully as can Explosion and Selfdestruct if a Pokemon with Damp is present. This move fails automatically when selected in link or wireless battles.
sketch.name: Sketch

skillswap.Effect: The user exchanges abilities with the target. does not work if Wonder Guard is the ability of either the user or the target.
skillswap.name: Skill Swap

skullbash.Effect: The user prepares on turn one raising its Defense by 1 stage and becoming uncontrollable and then attacks on turn two.
skullbash.name: Skull Bash

skyattack.Effect: The user prepares on turn one becoming uncontrollable and then attacks on turn two. Also has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
skyattack.name: Sky Attack

skyuppercut.Effect: Also hits targets in mid-air via Fly or Bounce.
skyuppercut.name: Sky Uppercut

slackoff.Effect: Restores 1/2 of the user's max HP.
slackoff.name: Slack Off

slash.Effect: Has a high critical hit ratio.
slash.name: Slash

sleeptalk.Effect: Does nothing if the user is awake. If the user asleep it randomly performs one of its attacks. Rest will fail if it is selected. Sleep Talk's generated attacks do not cost PP but it cannot generate moves with 0 PP itself Assist Bide Disabled attacks Focus Punch Metronome Mirror Move Uproar or attacks with a charge-up turn like Fly or Skull Bash. (Moves with a recharge turn like Hyper Beam can be generated.)
sleeptalk.name: Sleep Talk

sludge.Effect: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.
sludge.name: Sludge

sludgebomb.Effect: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.
sludgebomb.name: Sludge Bomb

smellingsalt.Effect: If the target is paralyzed power is doubled but the target will be cured.
smellingsalt.name: Smellingsalt

smog.Effect: Has a 40% chance to poison the target.
smog.name: Smog

smokescreen.Effect: Lowers the target's Accuracyuracy by 1 stage.
smokescreen.name: Smokescreen

snatch.Effect: Almost always goes first. Until the end of the turn the user will steal a supporting move from another Pokemon (including teammates). In Double Battles Snatch only steals the first applicable move performed by another Pokemon before wearing off.
snatch.name: Snatch

snore.Effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch. fails if user is awake.
snore.name: Snore

softboiled.Effect: Restores 1/2 of the user's max HP.
softboiled.name: Softboiled

solarbeam.Effect: The user prepares on turn one becoming uncontrollable and then attacks on turn two. During Sunny Day this move fires immediately. during Rain Dance Sandstorm and Hail this move has half power.
solarbeam.name: Solarbeam

spark.Effect: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
spark.name: Spark

spiderweb.Effect: As long as the user remains in battle the target cannot switch out unless it uses Baton Pass. The target will still be trapped if the user switches out by using Baton Pass.
spiderweb.name: Spider Web

spikecannon.Effect: Attacks 2-5 times in one turn. if one of these attacks breaks a target's Substitute the target will take damage for the rest of the hits. This move has a 3/8 chance to hit twice a 3/8 chance to hit three times a 1/8 chance to hit four times and a 1/8 chance to hit five times.
spikecannon.name: Spike Cannon

spikes.Effect: Damages opponents unless they are Flying-type or have Levitate every time they are switched in. hits through Wonder Guard. Can be used up to three times: saps 1/8 of max HP with one layer 3/16 of max HP with two layers and 1/4 of max HP for three layers.
spikes.name: Spikes

spitup.Effect: Power increases with user's Stockpile count. fails with zero Stockpiles.
spitup.name: Spit Up

spite.Effect: The target's most recent move is reduced by 2-5 PP. this fails if the target has not yet performed a move if the target's last move has run out of PP or if the target can only use Struggle.
spite.name: Spite

splash.Effect: Doesn't do anything (but we still love it).
splash.name: Splash

steelwing.Effect: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Defense by 1 stage.
steelwing.name: Steel Wing

stockpile.Effect: Can be used up to three times to power Spit Up or Swallow. Stockpiles are lost when these moves are used.
stockpile.name: Stockpile

stomp.Effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch. also retains its normal Accuracyuracy and gains doubled power against Minimized Pokemon.
stomp.name: Stomp

stringshot.Effect: Lowers the target's Speed by 1 stage.
stringshot.name: String Shot

struggle.Effect: Used automatically when all of the user's other moves have run out of PP or are otherwise inAccuracyessible. The user receives 1/4 recoil damage. Struggle is classified as a typeless move and will hit any Pokemon including Rock- Steel- and Ghost-type Pokemon for normal damage.
struggle.name: Struggle

substitute.Effect: The user takes one-fourth of its maximum HP to create a substitute. this move fails if the user does not have enough HP for this. Until the substitute is broken it receives damage from all attacks made by other Pokemon and shields the user from status effects and stat modifiers caused by other Pokemon. The user is still affected by Tickle Hail Sandstorm and Attract from behind its Substitute. If a Substitute breaks from a hit during a multistrike move such as Fury Attack the user takes damage from the remaining strikes.
substitute.name: Substitute

sunnyday.Effect: Cancels all other weather moves. For 5 turns: freezing is prevented the power of Fire attacks is increased by 50% the power of Water attacks is decreased by 50% Solarbeam fires immediately Thunder becomes 50% Accuracyurate and the healing power of Morning Sun Synthesis and Moonlight is increased from 1/2 to 2/3 of the user's max HP.
sunnyday.name: Sunny Day

superfang.Effect: This move halves the target's current HP.
superfang.name: Super Fang

superpower.Effect: Lowers the user's Attack and Defense by 1 stage each after use.
superpower.name: Superpower

surf.Effect: Power doubles against a target who is in the middle of using Dive.
surf.name: Surf

swagger.Effect: Confuses the target and raises its Attack by 2 stages.
swagger.name: Swagger

swallow.Effect: This move only works if the user has at least one Stockpile. Restores 1/4 of user's max HP with one Stockpile 1/2 of user's max HP with two Stockpiles and fully restores the user's HP with three Stockpiles.
swallow.name: Swallow

sweetscent.Effect: Lowers the target's Evasion by 1 stage.
sweetscent.name: Sweet Scent

swift.Effect: Ignores Evasion and Accuracyuracy modifiers and never misses except against Protect Detect or a target in the middle of Dig Fly Dive or Bounce.
swift.name: Swift

swordsdance.Effect: Raises the user's Attack by 2 stages.
swordsdance.name: Swords Dance

synthesis.Effect: Restores a fraction of the user's max HP depending on the weather: 2/3 during Sunny Day 1/2 during regular weather and 1/4 during Rain Dance Hail and Sandstorm.
synthesis.name: Synthesis

tailglow.Effect: Raises the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
tailglow.name: Tail Glow

tailwhip.Effect: Lowers the target's Defense by 1 stage.
tailwhip.name: Tail Whip

taunt.Effect: Prevents the target from using non-damaging moves for two turns. Assist Metronome Mirror Move and Sleep Talk are prevented during this time but Bide Counter Endeavor and Mirror Coat are not prevented.
taunt.name: Taunt

teeterdance.Effect: Each active Pokemon except the user becomes confused.
teeterdance.name: Teeter Dance

teleport.Effect: Escapes from wild battles. fails automatically in trainer and link battles.
teleport.name: Teleport

thief.Effect: Steals the target's held item unless the user is already holding an item or the target has Sticky Hold.
thief.name: Thief

thrash.Effect: The user attacks uncontrollably for 2-3 turns and then gets confused.
thrash.name: Thrash

thunder.Effect: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. Has 50% Accuracyuracy during Sunny Day and 100% Accuracyuracy during Rain Dance. Also has normal Accuracyuracy against mid-air Pokemon have used Fly or Bounce.
thunder.name: Thunder

thunderbolt.Effect: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.
thunderbolt.name: Thunderbolt

thunderpunch.Effect: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.
thunderpunch.name: Thunderpunch

thundershock.Effect: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.
thundershock.name: Thundershock

tickle.Effect: Lowers the target's Attack and Defense by 1 stage each.
tickle.name: Tickle

torment.Effect: Prevents the target from using the same move for two turns in a row until the target is switched out. The target will use Struggle every other turn if it cannot attack without using the same move.
torment.name: Torment

toxic.Effect: The target is badly poisoned with the damage caused by poison doubling after each turn. Toxic poisoning will remain with the Pokemon during the battle even after switching out.
toxic.name: Toxic

transform.Effect: The user morphs into a near-exact copy of the target. Stats stat modifiers type moves Hidden Power data and appearance are changed. the user's level and HP remain the same and each copied move receives only 5 PP. (If Transform is used by Ditto the effects of Metal Powder stop working after transformation.)
transform.name: Transform

triattack.Effect: Has a 20% chance to burn paralyze or freeze the target.
triattack.name: Tri Attack

trick.Effect: Exchanges items with the target unless it has Sticky Hold. Items lost to this move cannot be recovered by using Recycle.
trick.name: Trick

triplekick.Effect: Attacks three times in one turn adding 10 BP for each kick. If a kick misses the move ends instantly. if one of the kicks breaks a target's Substitute the real Pokemon will take damage for the remaining kicks.
triplekick.name: Triple Kick

twineedle.Effect: Strikes twice. if the first hit breaks the target's Substitute the real Pokemon will take damage from the second hit. Has a 20% chance to poison the target .
twineedle.name: Twineedle

twister.Effect: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch. power doubles while the target is in mid-air via Fly or Bounce.
twister.name: Twister

uproar.Effect: The user causes an Uproar and attacks uncontrollably for 2-5 turns. During the effects of the Uproar active Pokemon cannot fall asleep and sleeping Pokemon sent into battle will wake up.
uproar.name: Uproar

vitalthrow.Effect: This move usually goes last. It ignores Evasion and Accuracyuracy modifiers and never misses except against Protect Detect or a target in the middle of Dig Fly Dive or Bounce.
vitalthrow.name: Vital Throw

waterpulse.Effect: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.
waterpulse.name: Water Pulse

watersport.Effect: All Fire-type moves are 50% weaker until the user switches out.
watersport.name: Water Sport

waterspout.Effect: Base power decreases as the user's HP decreases.
waterspout.name: Water Spout

weatherball.Effect: Base power doubles and move's type changes during weather effects: becomes Fire-type during Sunny Day Water-type during Rain Dance Ice-type during Hail and Rock-type during Sandstorm.
weatherball.name: Weather Ball

whirlpool.Effect: Traps the target for 2-5 turns causing damage equal to 1/16 of its max HP each turn. this trapped effect can be broken by Rapid Spin. The target can still switch out if it uses Baton Pass. Base power also doubles when performed against a Pokemon in the middle of using Dive.
whirlpool.name: Whirlpool

whirlwind.Effect: Almost always goes last. in trainer battles the target is switched out for a random member of its team. Escapes from wild battles. Has no effect if the target has Suction Cups or used Ingrain.
whirlwind.name: Whirlwind

will-o-wisp.Effect: Burns the target. This move will not activate Flash Fire.
will-o-wisp.name: Will-O-Wisp

wish.Effect: At the end of the next turn the active Pokemon from the user's team is healed by 1/2 of its max HP. this can be any member of the user's team.
wish.name: Wish

withdraw.Effect: Raises the user's Defense by 1 stage.
withdraw.name: Withdraw

wrap.Effect: Traps the target for 2-5 turns causing damage equal to 1/16 of its max HP each turn. this trapped effect can be broken by Rapid Spin. The target can still switch out if it uses Baton Pass.
wrap.name: Wrap

yawn.Effect: If the target stays in battle it falls asleep at the end of the next turn.
yawn.name: Yawn

hiddenpowerfighting.Effect: Varies in power and type depending on the user's IVs. maximum 70 BP. Will hit as a Fighting-type move
hiddenpowerfighting.name: Hidden Power Fighting

hiddenpowerflying.Effect: Varies in power and type depending on the user's IVs. maximum 70 BP. Will hit as a Flying-type move
hiddenpowerflying.name: Hidden Power Flying

hiddenpowerpoison.Effect: Varies in power and type depending on the user's IVs. maximum 70 BP. Will hit as a Poison-type move
hiddenpowerpoison.name: Hidden Power Poison

hiddenpowerground.Effect: Varies in power and type depending on the user's IVs. maximum 70 BP. Will hit as a Ground-type move
hiddenpowerground.name: Hidden Power Ground

hiddenpowerrock.Effect: Varies in power and type depending on the user's IVs. maximum 70 BP. Will hit as a Rock-type move
hiddenpowerrock.name: Hidden Power Rock

hiddenpowerbug.Effect: Varies in power and type depending on the user's IVs. maximum 70 BP. Will hit as a Bug-type move
hiddenpowerbug.name: Hidden Power Bug

hiddenpowerghost.Effect: Varies in power and type depending on the user's IVs. maximum 70 BP. Will hit as a Ghost-type move
hiddenpowerghost.name: Hidden Power Ghost

hiddenpowersteel.Effect: Varies in power and type depending on the user's IVs. maximum 70 BP. Will hit as a Steel-type move
hiddenpowersteel.name: Hidden Power Steel

hiddenpowerfire.Effect: Varies in power and type depending on the user's IVs. maximum 70 BP. Will hit as a Fire-type move
hiddenpowerfire.name: Hidden Power Fire

hiddenpowerwater.Effect: Varies in power and type depending on the user's IVs. maximum 70 BP. Will hit as a Water-type move
hiddenpowerwater.name: Hidden Power Water

hiddenpowergrass.Effect: Varies in power and type depending on the user's IVs. maximum 70 BP. Will hit as a Grass-type move
hiddenpowergrass.name: Hidden Power Grass

hiddenpowerelectric.Effect: Varies in power and type depending on the user's IVs. maximum 70 BP. Will hit as a Electric-type move
hiddenpowerelectric.name: Hidden Power Electric

hiddenpowerpsychic.Effect: Varies in power and type depending on the user's IVs. maximum 70 BP. Will hit as a Psychic-type move
hiddenpowerpsychic.name: Hidden Power Psychic

hiddenpowerice.Effect: Varies in power and type depending on the user's IVs. maximum 70 BP. Will hit as a Ice-type move
hiddenpowerice.name: Hidden Power Ice

hiddenpowerdragon.Effect: Varies in power and type depending on the user's IVs. maximum 70 BP. Will hit as a Dragon-type move
hiddenpowerdragon.name: Hidden Power Dragon

hiddenpowerdark.Effect: Varies in power and type depending on the user's IVs. maximum 70 BP. Will hit as a Dark-type move
hiddenpowerdark.name: Hidden Power Dark
